results.name: Hippo Cart
results.description: Summon forth your hippo cart, a mean if not so lean transporting machine.
results.enhanced_description: Drawing upon the design of chocobo carriages, a collective of Arkasodara youths invented this two-wheeled hippo-drawn cart. The sunshade cloth incorporates techniques used in crafting Corvosi flying carpets, and grants cart and hippo both the ability to soar the skies.
results.tooltip: A hippo cart can outrun most anythin' in this jungle.    - Trna

results.name: Megashiba
results.description: Summon forth your megashiba mount─fluffy, living proof that massive can still be adorable.
results.enhanced_description: Sold as a “mameshiba,” a nonexistent miniature Far Eastern dog, this creature continued to grow until it was larger than a man. But despite its prodigious size, it has somehow retained its cuteness, which it combines with the practicality of being ridable.
results.tooltip: He's so fluffy!    - T'maritaa

results.name: Bluefeather Lynx
results.description: Summon forth your bluefeather lynx mount, which could be what a certain feathered familiar might look like as a large, winged feline.
results.enhanced_description: A phantom creation composed of the esoteric power of dynamis. It is believed that the Endsinger brought forth this mysterious entity, but for what purpose is unclear. Could it be a tribute, perhaps, bestowed upon one who has overcome her aria of despair?
results.tooltip: The light of hope shall ever guide our steps so long as we have the will to press onward.    - Edmont de Fortemps

results.name: Vinegaroon
results.description: Summon forth your vinegaroon mount, a carnivorous scalekin with a jaw reminiscent of claws.
results.enhanced_description: While it is common for dragons to use vinegaroons as servants, men have struggled to domesticate the creatures. In recent years, however, the gleaners have developed a successful training method, allowing them to be employed as beasts of burden.
results.tooltip: Those vinegaroons are always chasing after us moogles, snapping their bladed jaws and swinging their bladed tails.    - Impatient Moogle

results.name: Troll
results.description: Summon forth your troll mount, a gentle giant native to the northern seas.
results.enhanced_description: Contrary to their savage appearance, trolls are highly intelligent creatures. Sharlayan scholars once sought to teach them sign language, and on account of this specimen's friendly nature, it is believed that it was a subject in that experiment.
results.tooltip: If I didn't know better, I could've  sworn that troll was talking to you...    - Roegadyn Gleaner

results.name: Pod 602
results.description: Summon forth your pod 602 mount. May leave you hanging, but will never let you go. Unless it malfunctions, or runs out of energy, or...you get the idea.
results.enhanced_description: Recovered from the ruins of the machine lifeforms, this diminutive white machina was created to provide YoRHa units with movement support. On account of this, it can easily transport one person...if not exactly in style or comfort.
results.tooltip: Those who are ready and willing to fight will never want for transportation!    - Grand Company Flyer

results.name: Alkonost
results.description: Summon forth your alkonost, an imposing antlered avian native to northern Ilsabard.
results.enhanced_description: Captured in the Bozjan wilderness, this creature was passed around as a curiosity before eventually being released again. From the start, it seemed unperturbed in the presence of men, leading some to believe it was trained by an imperial beastmaster.
results.tooltip: How goes the training for your avian mount?    - Luquelot

results.name: Demi-Phoinix
results.description: Summon forth Demi-Phoinix. Because four wings are better than two and three heads better than one.
results.enhanced_description: This entity is a recreation of the being found imprisoned inside Pandæmonium. The original was the fruit of the ancients' research into immortal birds, but owing to its volatility, it was branded a failure.
results.tooltip: How do you spell that again?    - An Ancient

results.name: Porxie King
results.description: Summon forth your porxie king. Smells like bacon that's a cut above the rest─though that might just be an effect of the crown.
results.enhanced_description: Unlike its kin, this porxie was born without the ability to cure the tempered. Rather than have it go to waste, however, it was made into a mount and given a crown─perhaps to evoke a sense of luxury and comfort.
results.tooltip: This specimen can be considered royalty among them.    - Martineau

results.name: Wivre
results.description: Summon forth your wivre, a mighty horned beast said to be nature's battering ram.
results.enhanced_description: Native to the New World, these ill-mannered scalekin are notoriously difficult to tame. Yet where others have failed, the Mamool Ja have succeeded, their people employing wivres as beasts of burden and weapons of war both.
results.tooltip: I pray that you at least consider a watchful trot into danger rather than a headlong charge...    - Iliud

sources.text: Edelina - Mor Dhona - 500 Bicolor Gemstone Vouchers

results.name: Papa Paissa
results.description: Summon forth Papa Paissa. It's for a good cause.
results.enhanced_description: This exceptionally large paissa has sired no less than eight offspring, and in order to earn the coin to rear them, it chose to work as an adventurer's mount. By taking it into your service, you are supporting its adorable brood.
results.tooltip: I can only imagine the burden they bear with so many mouths to feed.    - Pip

results.name: Level Checker
results.description: Summon forth your level checker, a mysterious machine that can determine your strength...and apparently also shrink and carry you inside it.
results.enhanced_description: When this mysterious machine first determined your strength, the result was “level 90.” By what method it came up with its figure, and whether it is even accurate, none can possibly say.
results.tooltip: You've really taken it to another level with this!    - Kai-Shirr

sources.text: Nesvaaz - Radz-at-Han - 12 Chi Bolts (FATE "Omicron Recall: Killing Order")

results.name: Victor
results.description: Summon forth Victor, a dog to rule over all dogs─at dog shows, that is.
results.enhanced_description: Lauded by no less a personage than Emperor Varis, Victor is a perennial champion at Garlean dog shows. Being bred and trained for competition, it isn't suited to combat, though it may at least intimidate foes with its fearsome mien.
results.tooltip: Hmph, all bark an' no bite!    - Rabid Wives Houndkeep

results.name: Calydontis
results.description: Summon forth Calydontis. He's wild but he's yours.
results.enhanced_description: Once a dreaded presence in its forest domain, this lord among wild boars met its match in a band of dauntless adventurers. Having thus learned to bow before the strong, it found a master in you.
results.tooltip: When I'm skilled enough to fell a wild boar on my own, I'll allow myself to indulge...    - Isarmoix

results.name: Dreadnaught
results.description: Summon forth your dreadnaught, a hulking machina that's equally at home on the battlefield as it is at construction sites.
results.enhanced_description: Originally used as a weapon, this Allagan machina was eventually superseded by newer models and repurposed for construction. Legends tell of a young man who took one such unit on a rampage, wreaking havoc through enemy ranks.
results.tooltip: What does it do?    - Inquisitive Young Man

results.name: Argos
results.description: Summon forth Argos, Venat's faithful familiar, to bear you places while you marvel at the softness of his golden coat.
results.enhanced_description: Created by Venat, this dog-like familiar lends his back only to those who have won his favor─which you already had by the time you first met him in Mare Lamentorum owing to the quirks of time travel.
results.tooltip: Gosh, he's a fast doggy!    - Nashu Mhakaracca

results.name: Lynx Of Divine Light
results.description: Summon forth your lynx of divine light, which could be what a certain will of the star might look like as a large, winged feline.
results.enhanced_description: A phantom creation whose elemental aspect is tipped strongly towards the umbral. Its radiant wings call to mind the majesty of Hydaelyn, the will and protector of the star, but the origins of this familiar are shrouded in divine Light.
results.tooltip: So bold, so majestic─ just like a Warrior of Light!    - Humphrey

results.name: Lynx Of Eternal Darkness
results.description: Summon forth your lynx of eternal darkness, which could be what a certain eldest of all primals might look like as a large, winged feline.
results.enhanced_description: A phantom creation whose elemental aspect is tipped strongly towards the astral. Its shadowed wings call to mind the valiance of Zodiark, eldest and mightiest of primals, but the origins of this familiar are shrouded in eternal Darkness.
results.tooltip: Who are you, the Warrior of bleedin' Darkness!?    - Gallant Guardsman

results.name: Arion
results.description: Summon forth Arion, the heavenly steed of unmatched swiftness.
results.enhanced_description: Legends speak of a majestic and unwaveringly loyal horse who would never fail to deliver its master from peril. Such myths were founded in fact, as the divine steed has descended from the heavens to seek one possessed of a true and virtuous heart, with whom it may right the wrongs of the world.
results.tooltip: The speed of the horse is a grace unmatched!    - Uma Bugyo

results.name: Al-iklil
results.description: Summon forth Al-iklil, a stylish hovering craft designed to carry up to two riders. Any more and it may not heed you.
results.enhanced_description: A gift from Fran to the Bozjan Resistance, this craft hovers by the power of skystones, crystals that allow entire masses of land to levitate. Its name is said to be derived from an ancient Ivalician word meaning “crown.”
results.tooltip: I'm only here to see how the story unfolds. Any self-respecting leading man would do the same.    - Debonair Sky Pirate

results.name: Deinonychus
results.description: Summon forth your deinonychus. Cleverer than the average prehistoric carnivore.
results.enhanced_description: Native to the southern regions of Ilsabard, the deinonychus is cousin to the raptors that inhabit the Twelveswood. Possessed of superior intelligence, as seen in its habit of hunting in pairs, the beasts have been employed in warfare since antiquity.
results.tooltip: Clever girl...    - Hunter-turned-prey

results.name: Magicked Card
results.description: Summon forth your magicked card to take you wonder by wonder, over, sideways, and under.
results.enhanced_description: Crafted by Eorzea's foremost goldsmith, Godbert Manderville, this enchanted card is awarded to those who have collected an unprecedented number of Triple Triad cards. May it bear you through endless diamond skies, to dazzling places you never knew, and show you new fantastic points of view.
results.tooltip: Fancy a game of cards?    - Iola

sources.text: The Adventurer with All the Cards

results.name: Antelope Stag
results.description: Summon forth your antelope stag, a male creature identifiable by its horns, striped body, and...impressive size.
results.enhanced_description: Swift and sure-footed, antelopes have been favored as mounts by the tribes of Abalathia's Spine since ancient times. In recent years, ancient magicks have also made it possible for the creatures to fly so long as the rider has sufficient reserves of aether.
results.tooltip: A herd o' young antelope stags has gone berserk.    - Maximiloix

results.name: Antelope Doe
results.description: Summon forth your antelope doe, a female creature identifiable by the bluish tinge of its fur.
results.enhanced_description: Denizens of grasslands, antelopes once ranged as far as Coerthas before the Calamity buried the region in snow. Though coveted for their meat and milk, the creatures have eluded full domestication owing to their ornery temperament.
results.tooltip: Another day on the hunt, and naught but antelope meat to show for it.    - Isarmoix

results.name: Cruise Chaser
results.description: Summon forth your Cruise Chaser to cruise along in style as you give chase to your foes.
results.enhanced_description: Created by the genius minds of the Illuminati, this warmachina is capable of assuming bipedal and airship forms to adapt to the changing conditions of battle. Smitten by its design, it is said that a certain warmachina fanatic has a mind to produce a miniature version.
results.tooltip: The chase is on!    - Seserukka

results.name: Landerwaffe
results.description: Summon forth Landerwaffe, magnificent mechanical dragon of legend, and be the envy of all the other kids.
results.enhanced_description: Armed literally to the wings, this mechanical dragon is believed to have been created by the Allagan Empire to combat the creatures whose form it mimics. Magnificent and proud, it allows none upon its back save one whom it deems a true hero.
results.tooltip: Wow, you're swifter than a salamander!    - Pixie Flowerkeep

results.name: Resplendent Vessel Of Ronka
results.description: Summon forth the Resplendent Vessel of Ronka. Just like the Great Vessel of Ronka, but really shiny.
results.enhanced_description: After being stolen from ancient Ronkan ruins, this mystical urn passed through many an illicit hand before coming to be in yours. Blowing into the flute found within caused it to thus burgeon with the divine and take on a golden glow─ an auspicious sign if ever there was one.
results.tooltip: The great serpent...it speaks!    - Chaqurl Qhotl

results.name: Gilded Mikoshi
results.description: Summon forth your squad of gilded Namazu to bear you upon a gilded mikoshi─all of which is as gaudy as it sounds.
results.enhanced_description: In order to secure enough coin to fund their seven-year festival, the Namazu sought the counsel of Rowena, who spoke thus: if you want to make great profit, sell wares of great worth. And what could be worth more than a gilded mikoshi borne by eight gilded Namazu?
results.tooltip: Wasshoi! Wasshoi! What am I doing?  I do not know! I do not care! Whee!    - Namazu Spectator

results.name: Polar Bear
results.description: Summon forth your polar bear, a gentle giant with a soft spot for sweets.
results.enhanced_description: In search of ice to make frozen treats, the confectioner Nekeke traveled to an isle in the northern seas, where she encountered this hulking creature. A bite of her sweets was all it took for it to follow her back to Eorzea, where it subsequently grew fond of you.
results.tooltip: You're never too big for sweets.    - Ancient Saying

results.name: Diamond Gwiber
results.description: Summon forth your diamond gwiber, a draconic arcane entity.
results.enhanced_description: Believed to have been absorbed into the Diamond Weapon, this plate-clad being answers the call of a horn imbued with the power of an unknown primal, the summoner of whom is believed to have been a member of the Corvosi resistance.
results.tooltip: Everyone here is stubborn as a diamond ingot!    - Glagg

results.name: Lunar Whale
results.description: Summon forth the Lunar Whale, which is definitely not an actual whale, but certainly large enough to warrant the name. Seats up to eight people, including the pilot.
results.enhanced_description: Produced by Garlond Ironworks based on mysterious tales from a distant land, it not only resembles a whale on the outside, but shares its voluminous belly. With enough room for the pilot and seven passengers, it stands─or rather, floats─in a class of its own.
results.tooltip: She is risen! The promised Ship of Light─the Lunar Whale!    - A Man Known Simply as “Elder”

results.name: Gabriel Mark III
results.description: Summon forth your Gabriel Mark III mount, though you may find this transforming warmachina is less than meets the eye. Claims that its gold paint deflects laser beams are entirely unfounded.
results.enhanced_description: As any experienced adventurer knows, if a previously bested enemy appears again with a new color scheme, it will pose a significantly greater threat than before, or at least, take longer to kill. Luckily, this miniature prototype is on your side, or so you hope.
results.tooltip: Such a beautiful golden color!    - Ihase

results.name: Cerberus
results.description: Summon forth your Cerberus mount. Be warned, however, that riding into a peaceful village on the back of a gigantic, slavering, three-headed hellhound may cause quite a stir among the locals.
results.enhanced_description: In addition to its immense strength and three gaping maws lined with razor-sharp fangs, this voidsent boasts incredible longevity, having lived since the Third Astral Era. The collars, of Allagan design, are believed to make it as tame as a puppy, though it may simply be biding its time before devouring its keeper.
results.tooltip: What a nice little doggy!    - Nashu Mhakaracca

results.name: Big Shell
results.description: Summon forth your big shell mount, which is ironically rather small. Still quite big for a crab, though.
results.enhanced_description: Raised by a Qiqirn culinary connoisseur, this carefree crustacean formed a bond of friendship with its keeper, and in so doing, escaped the cookpot. Though it may not be the most obvious choice for a mount, its smooth, round shell makes it one of the more comfortable.
results.tooltip: Big shells are so named for the bigness of their shells, which they wear most bigly. Clever, yes?    - Qiqirn Zoologist

results.name: Construct VI-S
results.description: Summon forth your Construct VI-S. Painted red so it goes faster. Theoretically.
results.enhanced_description: This flashy golem was constructed by a band of commerce-minded kobolds hoping to establish regular trade with their seafaring neighbors. Coated in Lominsan red, propulsion power is apparently enhanced by as much as thirty percent.
results.tooltip: No one'll tell me what the bloody “S” stands for...    - Lieutenant Skaetswys

results.name: Chocorpokkur
results.description: Summon forth a chocorpokkur, which is... Well, perhaps you had best see it for yourself.
results.enhanced_description: This bizarre creature is the result of an enormous korpokkur coming into contact with vast amounts of chocolate. It has since taken to journeying far and wide to deliver sweet treats to anyone who does not immediately flee at the sight of it.
results.tooltip: This ambrosial aroma. This couldn't possibly be...chocolate!?    - Carvallain de Gorgagne

results.name: Prototype Roader
results.description: Summon forth a prototype roader, one of the fastest ways to reach your destination while scaring the seven hells out of everyone on the way.
results.enhanced_description: Salvaged from the battlegrounds of Gyr Abania and restored by goblins, this devilishly speedy─yet decidedly unwieldy─contraption is said to have a mind of its own. In this case, however, that turn of phrase may have a ring of truth to it...
results.tooltip: Gobbieflock does not go looking for trouble! Trouble comes looking for gobbieflock! ...Honest!    - Slowfix Cointoss

results.name: Emerald Gwiber
results.description: Summon forth your emerald gwiber, a draconic arcane entity.
results.enhanced_description: Called forth by a mysterious horn infused with the power of an unknown primal absorbed by the Emerald Weapon. Whether it sees through the glowing orb at the front of its snout or some other means is unclear.
results.tooltip: Rubies! Emeralds! Sapphires! Oh, how they sparkle!    - Uin Nee

results.name: Eden
results.description: Summon forth Eden, or rather, a considerably smaller version of the gargantuan entity.
results.enhanced_description: The existence of this miniaturized replica can be attributed─as with many, many other things─to a combination of aether and crystal, a fragment of which was discovered inside Eden itself. The result was this smaller likeness, which may be summoned at will and is *probably* less likely to trigger an apocalyptic catastrophe.
results.tooltip: Eden...the first sin eater.    - Gaia

results.name: Snowman
results.description: Summon forth a behatted and begloved embodiment of festive cheer.
results.enhanced_description: Scholars maintain that the tradition of building snowmen originated in Gyr Abania, where they were used to encourage blessings such as “cold” and “snow.” Considering that the region is almost entirely covered in arid desert, how the snowmen were built in the first place remains a mystery.
results.tooltip: Two words: stupendous snowman...    - Adventurer Who Shall Remain Unnamed

results.name: Gabriel Α
results.description: Summon forth your Gabriel α. Magic shield not included. Armaments for decorative purposes only.
results.enhanced_description: Prior to building a full-sized prototype of a new transforming armor dubbed *Gabriel*, project engineers created this scale test model to perform aerodynamic testing. While it passed said tests with flying colors, it was observed that its engine may be prone to running hot.
results.tooltip: It would seem there is more to you than meets the eye.    - Yugiri

results.name: Construct 14
results.description: Summon forth your Construct 14. Will dispose of friend and foe alike if so commanded, so be careful what you wish for.
results.enhanced_description: During their excavation in the Clockwork City of Goug, the IVth Imperial Legion discovered a host of worker automata, which they repurposed for war. As the name suggests, this particular construct is the fourteenth to undergo such a transformation.
results.tooltip: Were you able to find any machina worthy of sssalvaging?    - Eshana

results.name: Megalotragus
results.description: Summon forth your megalotragus, a herbivore so intimidating it puts carnivores to shame.
results.enhanced_description: Preferring colder climes, this imposing herbivore left its original habitat in Abalathia's Spine and migrated to Coerthas, which had frozen over in the Calamity's wake. Its kind are a primitive species that has largely remained unchanged over time, with some known to awaken to magical powers.
results.tooltip: If you squint just the right way, it looks like it's got ears! Or is it horns...?    - Nashu Mhakaracca

results.name: Incitatus
results.description: Summon forth Incitatus, an enchanted steed favored of the merchant Rowena. If it could talk, it would doubtless drive a hard bargain.
results.enhanced_description: Under the patronage of its mistress, Rowena, this enchanted steed has led a pampered life. Able to comprehend language, it was often seen attending Khloe Aliapoh's storytelling sessions, her tales of high adventure inspiring it to set out on one of its own.
results.tooltip: Your loyal steed awaits!    - Voyce

results.name: Ehll Tou
results.description: Summon forth Ehll Tou, the young dragon with a passion for crafting.
results.enhanced_description: First encountered as a curious dragonet, Ehll Tou became a dragon grown during her stay in Ishgard. With her passion for crafting, she underwent an evolution heretofore unseen in her kind, developing dexterous forelimbs that allow her to deftly wield all manner of implements.
results.tooltip: You have a knack for this, Ehll Tou!    - Hautdilong

results.name: Magitek Hyperconveyor
results.description: Call into battle your magitek hyperconveyor, a modern-day improvement on ancient Allagan logistics.
results.enhanced_description: Guided as ever by the ethos of constant advancement, imperial magitek engineers returned to improve their conveyor system, simplifying its assembly and trimming weight by 8%. The result is enhanced fuel efficiency, demonstrating that even world-conquering empires can be environmentally minded.
results.tooltip: Hah! Success!    - Aulus mal Asina

results.name: Jibanyan Couch
results.description: Summon forth the Jibanyan couch. A mysterious piece of furniture designed in the likeness of a Yo-kai named Jibanyan.
results.enhanced_description: Despite being modeled upon Jibanyan, an Earthbound Yo-kai, this couch is able to fly. It is said to be so comfortable as to turn men and Yo-kai alike into useless layabouts.
results.tooltip: Sluggards! Layabouts! Good-for-nothing reprobates!    - Seigetsu the Enlightened

sources.text: Yo-kai Watch Collaboration - Acquire 17 Yo-kai Weapons

results.name: Gwiber Of Light
results.description: Summon forth your gwiber of light, a draconic arcane entity.
results.enhanced_description: This light-bathed being answers to the sound of a horn imbued with the power of a hero of eld. In another time and place, perhaps it was the mount of a valiant soul who rose up against evil. Or perhaps not. The truth lies amidst the blinding light.
results.tooltip: Such radiance, such magnificence.    - The Wandering Minstrel

results.name: Rolling Tankard
results.description: Summon forth your Rolling Tankard, a mighty warmachina built by the blacksmiths of Watts's Anvil.
results.enhanced_description: Based on a concept by the legendary Watts, this dwarven warmachina is propelled by a nine-cylinder radial ethanol engine. Its turret-mounted crystal cannon makes short work of sin eaters, while its arms can perform essential motions such as upending tankards.
results.tooltip: The Rollin' Tankards, at your service!    - Ronitt

results.name: Chocobo Carriage
results.description: Summon forth your chocobo carriage to ferry your friends around in comfort.
results.enhanced_description: A ubiquitous mode of transportation in Eorzea, the chocobo carriage is kept aloft by ceruleum gas-filled bladders. This technology traces its origins to an early Ixali dirigible that crashed in the Twelveswood and was seized by Gridanian authorities.
results.tooltip: We get to ride a horsebird carriage? I don't know... It sounds scary.    - Doman Child

results.name: Pteranodon
results.description: Summon forth your pteranodon, a winged scalekin that has existed since ancient times.
results.enhanced_description: In the course of feeding upon food scraps discarded at the *Bounty*, this creature grew so familiar with men as to allow riders upon its back. This goes to show that the way to a prehistoric creature's heart is through its stomach.
results.tooltip: With what powerful magicks did they tame this dread fiend?    - Nashu Mhakaracca

results.name: Albino Karakul
results.description: Summon forth your albino karakul, a black sheep among its kind. Which is to say it's white.
results.enhanced_description: Though karakuls ordinarily have black fleece, this creature raised in the paddocks of House Haillenarte was born snowy white. This rarest of qualities spared it a fate at the dining table, and it grew to such a size as to be able to bear people upon its fluffy back.
results.tooltip: A wise knight keeps her own source of wool.    - Yaelle

results.name: Dhalmel
results.description: Summon forth your dhalmel, a towering herbivore native to the Sea of Clouds.
results.enhanced_description: While attempting to nibble at a tree on a nearby isle, this dhalmel lost its footing and fell. As it plunged towards certain death, the fervent desire to live awakened its latent ability to harness the wind, and thus did it soar to safety. This may or may not have happened, but let's say it did.
results.tooltip: You've never *seen* a dhalmel before!?    - Atelloune

results.name: Rubellite Carbuncle
results.description: Summon forth your Rubellite Carbuncle, an arcane entity given form by the mysteries of rubellite geometry.
results.enhanced_description: Those adventurers who have longed to hop on their Carbuncles' backs can give thanks to the arcanist Ulan, whose research into Diamond Carbuncle provided the necessary cues to create an arcane entity of ridable proportions. As its form is maintained by a large rubellite, it can be summoned even by those unversed in the ways of arcanima.
results.tooltip: Betrayed by my own Carbuncle yet again...    - Tataru

results.name: Ramuh
results.description: Summon forth Ramuh. No, not that one. The one you fought in the Empty. But not the actual one.
results.enhanced_description: It is believed that Shiva's summoning in the Empty caused lightning-aspected aether left over from your battle with Ramuh to coalesce. The resultant crystal, when imbued with magic, gives rise to an entity which assumes the form of the Lord of Levin in all of his horse-legged, hulking glory.
results.tooltip: Now nature sends thunder and lightning against us!    - Sylphie

results.name: Hybodus
results.description: Summon forth your hybodus to ride the winds and menace the skies.
results.enhanced_description: A close relative of the tornado shark, this fearsome fish soars the skies by means of an organ that allows it to manipulate wind-aspected aether. The four fins protruding from its head are used to deftly control its course in flight.
results.tooltip: What will the morrow bring? Sharks spilling from the sky in a spectacular shower of scales?    - Sisipu

sources.text: No More Fish In The Sea II

results.name: Ruby Gwiber
results.description: Summon forth your ruby gwiber, a draconic arcane entity.
results.enhanced_description: Believed to have been absorbed into the Ruby Weapon, this plate-clad being answers the call of a horn imbued with the power of an unknown primal. How the secrets of the horn came to be passed on to its summoner remains a mystery.
results.tooltip: A jeweler's daughter must be refined─*resplendent*. A ruby amongst the riffraff.    - Babawai

results.name: Great Vessel Of Ronka
results.description: Summon forth the Great Vessel of Ronka. Don't mind the contents.
results.enhanced_description: This ancient Ronkan urn was discovered empty save for a peculiar flute, the sound of which caused the vessel to suddenly become thus occupied. “Where did it come from?” the curious may be compelled to inquire, but the wise know better than to question the divine.
results.tooltip: The great serpent has spoken!    - Quinfort

sources.text: Yuqurl Manl - The Rak'tika Greatwood - 18 Qitari Compliments

results.name: Kingly Peacock
results.description: Summon forth your kingly peacock, an avian embodiment of nobility hailing from Othard.
results.enhanced_description: From the Near East to the Far, the peacock has long been esteemed not only for its beauty, but also its penchant for eating harmful vilekin. This particular creature belongs to a breed created by improving a species indigenous to Othard with geomancy.
results.tooltip: Don't you be taken in by his peacockin'.    - Rowena

results.name: Spriggan Stonecarrier
results.description: Summon forth your spriggan stonecarrier. Lives to carry ore, eggs, and you.
results.enhanced_description: Grown to a prodigious size by virtue of its appetite, this spriggan was choking on a chunk of ore when it was found and saved by a band of miners. Seeking to repay the kindness of men, it took to carrying their burdens, which apparently includes men themselves.
results.tooltip: It must be so tiring living each day carrying around a brain of solid stone.    - Da Za

results.name: Menoetius
results.description: Summon forth Menoetius. Just like Epimetheus, but more comfortable.
results.enhanced_description: Following their successful recreation of Epimetheus, Garlond Ironworks set out to refine the vehicle's design. Their efforts resulted in Menoetius, a model which retains its predecessor's speed while boasting improved comfort and manufacturability.
results.tooltip: Of late, all I can think about is Weapons, Weapons, Weapons.    - Warmachina Fanatic

results.name: Epimetheus
results.description: Summon forth Epimetheus, an unstoppable vehicle of war. Or at least it would be if it were bigger.
results.enhanced_description: Garlond Ironworks recreated this warmachina from a blueprint acquired by a Scion operative on a covert mission to Garlemald. As the dimensions were missing from the document, however, its size had to be estimated, the resultant vehicle being rather smaller than the original.
results.tooltip: I never dreamed that I would have the chance to see such a ferocious warmachina with my own eyes!    - Warmachina Fanatic

results.name: Construct VII
results.description: Summon forth your Construct VII. Rumors that it is heavily based on an Ivalician design are entirely unfounded. Well, almost.
results.enhanced_description: Having taken prisoner what they thought was an automaton during a skirmish with the kobolds, Maelstrom officers were shocked to find that it was instead a type of synthetic golem─but not so shocked as to not immediately bring it to Naldiq & Vymelli's for repair and later sale.
results.tooltip: So the kobolds are at it again...    - Anaoc

sources.text: One Steppe At A Time V

results.name: Morbol
results.description: Summon forth your morbol. Strong vines, soft heart...middling stench.
results.enhanced_description: Though all it has ever wanted is to help, this morbol was found to be “too sweet” to present a challenge at the Celestium, and was transferred to the Blue Mages' Guild before it had even seen its first match─only for it to be deemed “insufficiently vile” there as well.
results.tooltip: A morbol!? And things were going so well...    - Papalymo

results.name: Ufiti
results.description: Summon forth your ufiti. May carry you to high ground for your own safety.
results.enhanced_description: Having survived a cull of its kind by bloodthirsty adventurers on its native Diadem, this ufiti mastered the art of riding the winds, that it might set forth on a journey to find a worthy leader. Despite its brawn, it possesses a surprisingly delicate touch─and just as well it does.
results.tooltip: The strong are drawn to strength.    - Ywain

results.name: Forgiven Reticence
results.description: Summon forth your forgiven reticence. The strong and silent type, so don't expect rousing conversation.
results.enhanced_description: Alerted to its presence in the basement of Eulmore, the hunters of Clan Nutsy set out to vanquish this sin eater. Upon seeing that the creature was not aggressive, however, they decided to keep it instead.
results.tooltip: Pray excuse our reticence.    - Lucia

results.name: Shadow Gwiber
results.description: Summon forth your shadow gwiber, a draconic arcane entity.
results.enhanced_description: Answering to a horn imbued with the power of a sorcerer of eld, this draconic arcane entity is believed to have been created by Emet-Selch on a whim─an act that would have barely taxed his powers as an ancient.
results.tooltip: Are you some kind of lesser dragon, kupo?    - Mogzin

results.name: Portly Porxie
results.description: Summon forth your portly porxie. Bears you places to the tantalizing smell of cured meats.
results.enhanced_description: A prodigious porxie created by the Nu Mou Lugg Aenc for transportation purposes. Fond of sausages, it oft spends its free time in the curing chamber, and thus has come to take on the aroma. While comfortable to ride thanks to its soft curves, expect regular rumblings from its belly.
results.tooltip: Oooh, when I get my hands on those porxienappers...    - Uin Nee

sources.text: Jul Oul - Il Mheg - 18 Fae Fancy

results.name: Magicked Bed
results.description: Summon forth your magicked bed, and dream a little dream of never needing to get up.
results.enhanced_description: Once upon a time, in the Kingdom of Voeburt, there lived a member of the royal family slothful of body but quick of mind. This man desired naught more than to never be parted from his pillow, and so commissioned a bed that could fly...only to swiftly take to the sky without paying for it. He, presumably, lived happily ever after.
results.tooltip: Do not your mortal bodies tire? Far better to dwell in dream.    - Sri Lakshmi

results.name: Skyslipper
results.description: Summon forth your skyslipper, the greatest mechanical marvel to ever resemble a shoe.
results.enhanced_description: Once belonging to the imperial family, this unique craft was abandoned in a grotto by its owners due to a malfunction. It was later retrieved via airship and stored in the Crystal Tower, where it lay until its recent rediscovery and restoration by artisans of the Crystalline Mean.
results.tooltip: Ready to take us wherever we need to go, aye. Back again too, maybe, if we ask it nicely.    - Thancred

results.name: Battle Tiger
results.description: Summon forth your battle tiger, now with 100% more sharp things with which to terrorize your foes.
results.enhanced_description: In the region of Bozja in Ilsabard, the sabertooth tiger has long been employed in warfare as part of infantry. Many soldiers developed an enduring bond with the beasts, whom they would affectionately refer to as their “kittens.”
results.tooltip: Tigers! And they look hungry!    - Hapless Namazu

results.name: Amaro
results.description: Summon forth your amaro, Norvrandt's favorite beast of burden.
results.enhanced_description: Of all the mounts seen in Norvrandt, naught is more ubiquitous than the amaro. Originally created by the mages of ancient Ronka, who selectively bred the flightless cama, present-day beasts carry the seed of their ancestors, which may manifest in the form of superior intellect.
results.tooltip: That ever-so-endearing “gwee!” It's enough to melt a man's heart, I tell you.    - Lamlyn

results.name: Sunspun Cumulus
results.description: Summon forth the sunspun cumulus. It is unclear whether its previous owner was a boy with a tail or simply a monkey.
results.enhanced_description: There is but one man in all of Hydaelyn who can create such a mystical masterpiece, and it is said he resides upon a misty peak hidden within the mountain ranges of Doma. Crafted by stitching together dozens of smaller clouds dyed golden by the sun, this cumulus is said to bring good fortune to its rider.
results.tooltip: If you live with your head in the clouds, sooner or later you'll find yourself on your rear.    - Brangwine

results.name: Circus Ahriman
results.description: Summon forth your Circus ahriman, a voidsent bred by the Continental Circus.
results.enhanced_description: Raised in hopes that its Dread Gaze would reap a bountiful harvest of terror, this ahriman proved a disappointment. It has since found a new calling as an adventurer's trusty mount.
results.tooltip: You have the eye of an ahriman, Yda.    - Y'shtola

results.name: Innocent Gwiber
results.description: Summon forth your innocent gwiber, a draconic arcane entity.
results.enhanced_description: Answering to a horn imbued with the almighty Innocence's power, this draconic arcane entity is enveloped in the selfsame glow as the Lightwarden whence it takes its name. Rest assured it is not a sin eater.
results.tooltip: It would not do for an unadorned winged lizard to be the protagonist.    - Alberic

results.name: Ironfrog Mover
results.description: Summon forth your ironfrog mover, a dwarven-made automaton.
results.enhanced_description: Dwarven artisans have reinforced this automaton to improve lower body durability as well as installed a propulsion unit to enable flight. The techniques employed in its creation are a jealously guarded secret, and a blight upon the beards of they who betray it.
results.tooltip: Lali-ho!    - Every Single Dwarf

sources.text: Fathard - Eulmore - 12 Formidable Cog (FATE "A Finale Most Formidable")

results.name: Triceratops
results.description: Summon forth your triceratops seemingly from a page right out of prehistory.
results.enhanced_description: In defiance of its bulk, this prehistoric horned beast has been rendered capable of flight courtesy of its saddle. Employing Ronkan ingenuity, the singular contraption was modified from an artifact discovered within ancient ruins by the moogle Nutsy, fearless leader of the clan of his namesake.
results.tooltip: Can you please go and steal a dinosaur egg for us?    - Vath Braveheart

results.name: Fae Gwiber
results.description: Summon forth your fae gwiber, a draconic arcane entity.
results.enhanced_description: Desiring to recreate the fantastical beast known as the dragon, a sorcerer from ages past fashioned a horn imbued with Titania's power. The creature which answers the sound is aglow with fae magicks.
results.tooltip: Come to hear about dragon legends, yes, yes?    - Gyodo

results.name: War Tiger
results.description: Summon forth your war tiger to tear the enemy's morale to shreds with its cruel, curved fangs.
results.enhanced_description: Even among tigers, the sabertooth is said to be notoriously difficult to tame, but those creatures raised from birth may come to bear riders upon their backs and into war.
results.tooltip: T-T-T-T-T-TIGERS!!! - Hapless Namazu

results.name: Grani
results.description: Summon Grani, heroic steed from a realm not your own.
results.enhanced_description: Possessed of a strength of both mind and body that is unmatched in the First, as a mount, Grani has no peer on land nor in the heavens. It is said, however, the noble creature will only accept a rider who has pledged to restore shadow to a land bereft of night.
results.tooltip: The lives of my men may depend upon the swiftness of your steed...    - Topher

results.name: Demi-Ozma
results.description: Call into battle Demi-Ozma─the round mound of spellbound.
results.enhanced_description: After concluding that Ozma of the Weeping City was but a preliminary attempt to weave an aether-based simulacrum of the Eurekan phenomenon Proto Ozma, the Students of Baldesion endeavored to apply similar magicks in the creation of what they dubbed “Demi-Ozma,” hoping to learn what makes the entity tick.
results.tooltip: Follow the sphere!    - X'rhun Tia

results.name: Magitek Avenger A-1
results.description: Call into battle your magitek avenger A-1─outfitted and optimized for alpine warfare.
results.enhanced_description: Proving once again there is naught a Garlean engineer can do that a goblin cannot do better, this magitek avenger, nicknamed the “Yeti,” has been repurposed with several layers of self-insulating exoplating, which draw on the ceruleum engine's residual heat to keep the rider warm even in the coldest of climes.
results.tooltip: I'll avenge myself, kupo!    - Pukla Puki

results.name: Eurekan Petrel
results.description: Summon your Eurekan petrel, because who hasn't dreamed of gazing down upon all creation from the mantle of a wind-borne gastropod?
results.enhanced_description: Of all the species of petrels known to man, the Eurekan petrel is the only one which is not actually a petrel, but, in fact, an oversized carnivorous sea slug. Admittedly, unlike most sea slugs, this unique variety possesses the capacity for extended flight, hence the understandable misnomer.
results.tooltip: I know you love me, little swallow, but sometimes you just have to let go!    - Karasu

results.name: Regalia Type-G
results.description: Summon forth your Regalia Type-G, ceruleum-powered magitek transportation vehicle crafted by Garlond Ironworks.
results.enhanced_description: To hear Cid tell it, equal parts elbow grease and gumption were all that was required to see the Type-G (for “Garlond”) fully operational...when, in all truth, the otherworldly carriage most likely required an amazing amount of reverse engineering to recreate.
results.tooltip: Do they truly believe it makes them look more imposing? Or are they merely compensating for something?    - Lalai

results.name: Hallowed Kamuy
results.description: Summon your hallowed kamuy, noble wolf blessed by the azure auspice Seiryu.
results.enhanced_description: Abandoned by its master, this loyal canine was discovered by the auspice Seiryu and granted a new life in service of the thousand-year-old lord.
results.tooltip: A wolf! Or at least someone what's got big ears and a long fluffy tail!    - Nashu Mhakaracca

results.name: Kamuy Of The Nine Tails
results.description: Summon Kamuy of the Nine Tails, legendary auspice, completely independent from Kyubi of the Nine Tails.
results.enhanced_description: Only an individual who has proven his worth by taming no less than seven kamuy might summon this fabled vulpine auspice from her burrow in the heavens. Despite obvious similarities to the *other* vulpine auspice, Kyubi of the Nine Tails, this ageless vixen has her own storied history...which is, sadly, too long to list here.
results.tooltip: Most revered among the kamuy, Kyubi is come!    - The Wandering Minstrel

results.name: Sabotender Emperador
results.description: Summon forth Sabotender Emperador and bask in his desert sun radiance.
results.enhanced_description: No one knows exactly why the Manderville Gold Saucer was built to resemble a sabotender, just as no one knows why its mascot is a sabotender or why more than half of its drink menu features sabotender-themed “cact-tails.” This giant flying sabotender will not see you any closer to those answers, but it is fun to stare at.
results.tooltip: Very fleet of foot, those sabotenders.    - Mayaru Moyaru

results.name: Maxima Roader
results.description: Call into battle your maxima roader─many times mightier than the mightiest of magna roaders.
results.enhanced_description: Following their discovery of an imperial roader abandoned in Gyr Abania, several clever goblins came up with the ingenious plan to not only refurbish the damaged warmachina, but to improve upon its design by adding cermet alloy exoplating and reorganizing synthetic musculature.
results.tooltip: We've a bloody long road ahead of us.    - Mitsuba

results.name: Magicked Carpet
results.description: Summon forth your magicked carpet. Fantasy will set you free. Finally.
results.enhanced_description: It is said an ancient king of Corvos, upon conquering a tribe of faeries, bid the faerie queen weave her magicks to forge an object the likes mankind had never seen. The queen was executed shortly after presenting the king with a flying carpet. This is not *that* carpet, but at least no one was slain in its creation.
results.tooltip: Just be careful not to spill any beverages on the carpets.    - Choir Moogle

results.name: Eldthurs
results.description: Summon forth your Eldthurs, named for a fiery giant who once ruled a realm of flame with his brothers.
results.enhanced_description: Despite the imposing name, naturalists believe Eldthursar to be naught but yeti whose ancestors forswore their icy mountain homes, choosing instead the molten lakes of Pyros to raise their young. Though not necessarily known for their obedience, this particular specimen has been trained to accept the orders of a rider without taking a bite out of her thigh.
results.tooltip: The giants were... thorough in their work.    - Alianne

results.name: Fat Black Chocobo
results.description: Summon forth your fat black chocobo and marvel at its flurry of pitch-dark plumage.
results.enhanced_description: According to those familiar with this prodigious poultry's journey from flightless fledgling to full-blown fowl, the cloudkin achieved its staggering girth after several summers of gluttonously gulping chunks of charred chicken. Though, many speculate that the chocobo is, in fact, no chocobo at all, but a heretofore unseen spirit (or demon) of Dravania's dark wood.
results.tooltip: Black winds bring terrible news!    - Linu Vali

results.name: Magna Roader
results.description: Call into battle your magna roader and try not to think too hard on why it is called such.
results.enhanced_description: Following their discovery of an imperial roader abandoned in Gyr Abania, several clever goblins came up with the ingenious plan to refurbish the damaged warmachina. The auto-pilot systems, however, were beyond repair, so the engineers were forced to compromise by adding a mannable cockpit.
results.tooltip: We have a long road ahead of us.    - Mogzin

results.name: Fatter Cat
results.description: Summon your fatter cat─fatter than a fat cat, obviously.
results.enhanced_description: Seeing as how this pursy pussy can defy the very laws of physics by propelling itself high into the firmament, it is very likely that the creature is either a voidsent using a bloated cat's corpse as its corporeal vessel, or a deceased pet reanimated by one well versed in the necromantic arts.
results.tooltip: The entire city would be overrun with large-testicled raccoon dogs and flying rainbow cats...    - Kyokuho

results.name: Magitek Sky Armor
results.description: Call into battle your magitek sky armor, state-of-the-art Garlean flight technology at an affordable price.
results.enhanced_description: After engine failure saw this single-seated warmachina abandoned on the field of battle, it was salvaged by members of the Eorzean Alliance who had the device sent to the Garlond Ironworks for research and repair.
results.tooltip: MuSt... ReTrIeVe... ArMoR...    - Tsukumo

results.name: Model O
results.description: Call into battle your Model O, autonomous aerial transport device constructed in Omega's interdimensional manufactory.
results.enhanced_description: Though it is difficult to fathom why Omega would require a weaponless flying mount designed to comfortably accommodate a denizen of Hydaelyn, Garlond Ironworks engineers posit the construct was fabricated in an attempt to better understand its enemies.
results.tooltip: 'Tis one of Omega's creations.    - Midgardsormr

results.name: Euphonious Kamuy
results.description: Summon your euphonious kamuy, noble wolf blessed by the scarlet auspice Suzaku.
results.enhanced_description: Having sacrificed its life to save his master, this magnificent canine was spared the pull of the Lifestream by the auspice Suzaku and her scarlet flames of rebirth.
results.tooltip: Yes, yes, that's the spirit, little wolves...    - Disembodied Voice

results.name: SDS Fenrir
results.description: Call into battle the SDS Fenrir, a lore-bending battlebike that looks as if it was driven straight from an age unknown.
results.enhanced_description: Manufactured for use by the now-defunct Strife Delivery Service, this two-wheeled monstrosity's ceruleum engine howls like the silver wolf of legend as it propels its rider across desert and plain.
results.tooltip: Misfortune is no excuse for failing a delivery!    - Hildeyerd

results.name: Indigo Whale
results.description: Summon forth a massive whale straight from the Indigo Deep. If only you could do this with fish as well.
results.enhanced_description: Pods of these massive wavekin are believed to traverse the Indigo Deep for thousands of malms in pursuit of food. Why they would choose to limit themselves to the confines of the sea despite possessing the capacity for aether-assisted flight is a mystery scholars have pondered for centuries.
results.tooltip: Why, what a whale you've whisked out of the whitecaps!    - Wawalago

results.name: Typhon
results.description: Summon forth Typhon, hideous voidsent aberration and standout employee at the Manderville Gold Saucer.
results.enhanced_description: Since his summoning from the void by the Thaumaturges' Guild, Typhon has experienced his share of ups and downs. Through an employment opportunity at the Manderville Gold Saucer, however, the gaping-mawed horror─described by close acquaintances as quiet and reserved─has (figuratively speaking) landed back on his feet.
results.tooltip: Is that your st-stomach I hear rumbling?    - Ultros

results.name: Rathalos
results.description: Summon forth your mighty Rathalos─a wyvern far, far from home.
results.enhanced_description: Many a brave hunter has attempted to topple this flame-belching beast from his fiery throne atop the forest, yet only a few can claim to have conquered the King of the Skies.
results.tooltip: The wyverns are scary. Is there no safe place?    - Wandering Gnath

results.name: Juedi
results.description: Summon Juedi, and jump straight to ludicrous speed.
results.enhanced_description: Its ancient Doman name loosely translating to “ludicrously swift steed that runs so fast its feet no longer touch the ground,” Juedi is yet another horse of legend, showered with geomantic magicks to grant the creature the gift of flight.
results.tooltip: How mightily she must have toiled to *become* a horse...    - Haurchefant

results.name: Dodo
results.description: Summon forth your noble dodo─hopefully not the last one in existence.
results.enhanced_description: For centuries people of the Far East believed the dodo lost─the cloudkin hunted to extinction by poachers who would use its feathers for petticoats and its eggs for cheesy omelettes. The recent discovery of a nest in the upper echelons of Heaven–on–High, however, has given naturalists hope that the species may still endure.
results.tooltip: Those are some interestin'-lookin' dodos ye've got there.    - Jacke

results.name: Prototype Conveyor
results.description: Call into battle your prototype magitek conveyor, a modern-day improvement on ancient Allagan logistics.
results.enhanced_description: It is not in Garlean nature to leave well enough alone, and so, not a single moon after the completion of their new conveyor system, imperial magitek engineers returned to the drawing board to improve upon their creation─replacing existing steel exoplates with *high-quality* steel exoplates.
results.tooltip: You are not *supposed* to be able to descend of your own volition.    - Nero tol Scaeva

results.name: Safeguard System
results.description: Call into battle your Allagan safeguard system. For your safety and the safety of those around you, all weaponry has been disabled.
results.enhanced_description: One of the automated system drones deployed by the Allagans to maintain and protect their strongholds. After being unearthed by the Sons of Saint Coinach, the mechanical sphere's processing unit was updated with the aid of Garlond Ironworks engineers to improve security.
results.tooltip: The system crashes...    - Ardashir

results.name: Mikoshi
results.description: Summon your team of Namazu bearers, carrying a garish mikoshi upon which to precariously perch as they waddle to your destination.
results.enhanced_description: Due to excessive zeal on the part of Gyoshin, this mikoshi was crafted with more cloudsbreath than is necessary or, indeed, safe. Thus, it not only floats atop the shoulders of its bearers, it soars aloft regardless of their presence─though that does not discourage them from clinging to its poles anyway.
results.tooltip: Wasshoi! Wasshoi! Wassh─ Ow! I think I pulled something...    - Gyoshin

results.name: Magitek Conveyor
results.description: Call into battle your magitek conveyor, a modern-day improvement on ancient Allagan logistics.
results.enhanced_description: It is not in Garlean nature to leave well enough alone, and so for the past twenty summers, imperial magitek engineers have been perfecting the art of aerial transport. Surprisingly, it is not outfitted with an active weapons system─clearly an oversight that will be amended in the next model.
results.tooltip: I cannot begin to comprehend what our visitor is trying to convey.    - OIC Administrator

results.name: Lunar Kamuy
results.description: Summon forth the lunar kamuy, noble wolf blessed by the Lady of the Moon.
results.enhanced_description: When a wild wolf living in an abandoned imperial stronghold is bathed in the aether of a goddess reborn, amazing results are to be expected.
results.tooltip: Doth the sun, in her midday glory, outshine the moon of a night silent and solitary?    - Seigetsu the Enlightened

results.name: Red Hare
results.description: Summon forth the Red Hare─legendary steed known for both its unmatchable speed and its fiery red coat.
results.enhanced_description: Ganen was known for his imposing presence on the battlefield, a trait that can partially be attributed to his mount, the Red Hare─a lightning-swift steed magicked to stride the very heavens. This horse is said to be a direct descendant of the awe-inspiring stallion. Probably.
results.tooltip: ...I spring across the battlefield with the swiftness of the rabbit!    - Gyosei

results.name: Tyrannosaur
results.description: Summon forth your tyrannosaur and experience firsthand a lost time when scalekin ruled the world.
results.enhanced_description: Alarmed scholars report that the “T-Rex”—as it is called by those short on ink—has gained the power of flight through continued exposure to the Isle of Val's turbulent aether. Despite its ferocious nature, some still approach it, insisting it can be tamed by an adventurer of great strength.
results.tooltip: The tyrannosaurs have become pests as of late.    - Vath Keeneye

results.name: Air Force
results.description: Call into battle Air Force, a flying weapon of masculine destruction somehow smuggled from Omega's Sigmascape.
results.enhanced_description: From the amount of ordinance equipped, one can gather that this oddly shaped airship was employed in battle. However, being from the Sigmascape, who employed it and when are anyone's guess. The shark maw painted on its bow suggests an underwater civilization.
results.tooltip: Transforming the wonder of air travel into a means for delivering death is blasphemy of the highest order!    - Tataramu

results.name: Broken Heart (Left)
results.description: Summon forth your broken heart─a magicked chair representing the left half of a Valentione's Day heart.
results.enhanced_description: Burdened with a warehouse of unsold broken heart chairs, House Valentione came up with the diabolic plan to repurpose the cushions with cloudsbreath and peddle them to the unknowing masses as flying mounts. Lady Lisette dreams of one day riding the hearts on her honeymoon.
results.tooltip: But alas...the heart will not be denied.    - Byakudan

results.name: Broken Heart (Right)
results.description: Summon forth your broken heart─a magicked chair representing the right half of a Valentione's Day heart.
results.enhanced_description: Burdened with a warehouse of unsold broken heart chairs, House Valentione came up with the diabolic plan to repurpose the cushions with cloudsbreath and peddle them to the unknowing masses as flying mounts.
results.tooltip: But alas...the heart will not be denied.    - Byakudan

results.name: True Griffin
results.description: Summon forth your true griffin, a noble winged beast native to the hidden reaches of Abalathia's Spine.
results.enhanced_description: Covered in the pristine white feathers representative of a true griffin, this native of Abalathia's Spine has been trained by Giff, one of the Ala Mhigan Resistance's most competent handlers. So tame is the creature that it will even emit powerful bursts of air on command.
results.tooltip: Their meat's supposed to be some of the best around.    - Papin

results.name: Marid
results.description: Summon forth your marid, trained by the Ananta and outfitted with a magicked carpet allowing for flight.
results.enhanced_description: There was once a time when if someone told you they witnessed a marid aloft, you could have had them committed to a sanatorium. Now, marids crisscross the skies thanks, in part, to magicked carpets which the Ananta affix to the backs of beasts they train for battle.
results.tooltip: A rampaging marid is absolutely unssstoppable.    - Dakshina

results.name: Magitek Death Claw
results.description: Call into battle your magitek death claw, an imperial warmachina based on ancient Allagan technology.
results.enhanced_description: Ancient Allagan weaponry known as an “iron claw” is believed to be the inspiration for this deadly example of imperial ingenuity. While most of the death claws deployed in battle are used for logistical purposes, this particular model has been customized by stationarii units for enemy capture.
results.tooltip: Only so many of us find machina pretty, my dear.    - Mide

results.name: Auspicious Kamuy
results.description: Summon forth the auspicious kamuy, blessed wolf who shall not be bound by such corporeal laws as gravity or aerodynamics.
results.enhanced_description: Said to be swaddled in the very winds of heaven, this majestic creature was once a brutal killer of man. A chance meeting with auspice lord Byakko, however, saw the bloodlust in its heart fade.
results.tooltip: I did not anticipate the arrival of that fearsome hound.    - X'rhun Tia

results.name: Nezha Chariot
results.description: Summon forth your Nezha chariot and travel the skies like a god.
results.enhanced_description: Yanxian legend tells of a chariot that would carry gods and heroes across the heavens that they might keep watch over their earthbound children. Surprisingly, the realm's flora and fauna are unscathed by the fire and wind belched forth by the divine carriage.
results.tooltip: You look to me like a woman in need of a nice, relaxin' carriage ride!    - Bremondt

results.name: Citrine Carbuncle
results.description: Summon forth your Citrine Carbuncle, an arcane entity given form by the mysteries of citrine geometry.
results.enhanced_description: Those adventurers who have longed to hop on their Carbuncles' backs can give thanks to the arcanist Ulan, whose research into Diamond Carbuncle provided the necessary cues to create an arcane entity of ridable proportions. As its form is maintained by a large citrine, it can be summoned even by those unversed in the ways of arcanima.
results.tooltip: My, what a splendid thing you are.    - Ulan

results.name: Aquamarine Carbuncle
results.description: Summon forth your Aquamarine Carbuncle, an arcane entity given form by the mysteries of aquamarine geometry.
results.enhanced_description: Those adventurers who have longed to hop on their Carbuncles' backs can give thanks to the arcanist Ulan, whose research into Diamond Carbuncle provided the necessary cues to create an arcane entity of ridable proportions. As its form is maintained by a large aquamarine, it can be summoned even by those unversed in the ways of arcanima.
results.tooltip: What have we here? An admirer of the arcane? A connoisseur of Carbuncles?    - Ulan

results.name: Korpokkur Kolossus
results.description: Summon forth your korpokkur kolossus, a veritable colossus among its kind.
results.enhanced_description: In search of an ideal home, this korpokkur journeyed long malms before finally coming to a stop at the Gold Saucer. The trek across the scorching Sagolii had reduced it to a withered husk, but when next it drank, it experienced what could only be described as an epic rebound.
results.tooltip: What have you been feeding this thing?    - Forward Maiden

results.name: Magitek Avenger
results.description: Call into battle your magitek avenger, an imperial warmachina made mightier by goblin hands.
results.enhanced_description: The goblins have carried out extensive work on this magitek avenger, among other things changing it from an autonomous killing machine to one requiring a pilot. After all, there's no substituting the satisfaction of dealing vengeance with one's own hands. Sort of.
results.tooltip: Pshkohhh! Revenge!    - Moundrinx Eightclinks

results.name: Flying Chair
results.description: Summon forth a flying chair to bear you in high style.
results.enhanced_description: Featuring elegant lines and designed to minimize waste, this lovingly crafted chair is bound to fly into the hearts of adventurers the world over. No assembly required.
results.tooltip: Maximum load: 240 pz.

results.name: Striped Ray
results.description: Summon forth your striped ray, a majestic creature native to the Ruby Sea.
results.enhanced_description: Raised and trained by the Kojin, this striped ray has the same mellow temperament as its original masters. Its flat body works in like fashion to the aether-imbued wings of an airship, allowing it to catch water- and wind-aspected aether to glide through both sea and sky with ease.
results.tooltip: I advise you to stand back when he regurgitates everything.    - Zukin

results.name: Legendary Kamuy
results.description: Summon forth the legendary kamuy, blessed wolf who shall not be bound by such corporeal laws as gravity or aerodynamics.
results.enhanced_description: Perpetually enveloped in a divine glow, it is said to have been born when an Ala Mhigan war hound chanced to bathe in Shinryu's light in the moment of the primal's birth.
results.tooltip: It is a delicate dance... and one which asks much of my hounds.    - Zenos yae Galvus

results.name: Starlight Bear
results.description: Summon forth your Starlight bear, and delight the younglings to no end.
results.enhanced_description: Unlike his wild cousins, Kochab the bear can be relied upon to delight folk rather than tear them apart. Raised from a cub by Celebrant Baenfaeld, he has mastered the art of Starburst-lobbing, a skill that proved useful in hunting down thieving treants.
results.tooltip: I never knew bears could be so adorable!    - Festival-goer

results.name: Mystic Panda
results.description: Summon forth your mystic panda. From Doma. From a thousand years ago.
results.enhanced_description: Armed with the unexplainable ability to levitate...and little else, this thousand-year-old creature (age unconfirmed) has descended the ancient peaks of the Othardian Fanged Crescent in search of a hero to help Doma wrench free from the iron clutches of the Garlean Empire.
results.tooltip: Used to be prime huntin' grounds... that is, till the bears moved in.    - Tailfeather Hunter

results.name: Managarm
results.description: Summon forth Managarm, a legendary hound said to dwell in the hidden depths of Abalathia's Spine.
results.enhanced_description: Some say that Managarm is merely a myth. Others believe it to be an extinct beast. Both are wrong, as you well know. According to Abalathian legend, this fearsome hound roams the celestial sphere in pursuit of the moon, whose light it relishes─or so it may appear to those who witness it soaring the skies, spawning spectral flames.
results.tooltip: I should have been the one to feed your dark hound with light!    - From an Ancient Epic

sources.text: Calamity Salvager - 8 Gold Chocobo Feathers (Recruit a Friend Campaign)

results.name: Falcon
results.description: Call into battle the *Falcon*, (unofficially) the fastest single-rider airship ever built in Eorzea.
results.enhanced_description: An independent project of Garlond Ironworks engineer Wedge, this single-rider airship allegedly recorded some of the fastest flight speeds ever...until a tragic accident following an attempt to see how high the ship could soar convinced its creator that perhaps a modicum of restraint was necessary.
results.tooltip: All you have to do is follow the falcon. He knows where to go.    - Baurendouin de Haillenarte

results.name: Alte Roite
results.description: Summon forth Alte Roite, fantastical ur-being generated by Omega within the Deltascape.
results.enhanced_description: While none can be certain the exact intentions of a self-aware interdimensional construct, logic suggests this winged aberration is a reimagination of Alte Roite─a legendary wizard who is said could take the shape of a dragon at will.
results.tooltip: That knowledge is my ticket straight to glory. I can't go telling any old person about it.    - Bonifoix

results.name: Ixion
results.description: Summon forth mighty Ixion, legend of the Gyr Abanian highlands.
results.enhanced_description: Ask any Gyr Abanian youth, and she will tell you the story of Ixion, Rhalgr's magnificent steed─swift as a levinbolt and strong as thunderclap. However, the recent discovery of several ancient Mhachi texts suggests that the creature may simply be a stallion augmented by ancient technologies that have granted Ixion life eternal...and the ability to shoot lightning from its eyes.
results.tooltip: He said what? “Horses are that strong”?    - Red Uma Doshin

sources.text: Eschina - Rhalgr's Reach - 12 Ixion Horns (FATE "A Horse Outside")

results.name: Syldra
results.description: Summon forth Syldra. Even in death, she would want to help.
results.enhanced_description: Legends say there once lived a kindly sea dragon who befriended a pirate, and that their friendship knew no bounds. This is not that sea dragon; however, with a little time and caring, who is to say that a similar relationship cannot be forged? ※Sea dragons have no relation to actual dragons.
results.tooltip: I said, get off!    - Faris

results.name: Centurio Tiger
results.description: Summon forth your Centurio tiger, one mark the Clan actually does not want seen slain.
results.enhanced_description: In a rare display of misguided compassion, a member of Clan Centurio returned from a Hunt with the whimpering cub of a slain S-rank mark. Unable to grant it the mercy it so deserved, the veteran took to caring for the beast until his deceit was discovered and his membership revoked. However, by then, not a single other member could bring themselves to harm the pet they had all come to love.
results.tooltip: This game of cat and mouse continued for what seemed an eternity.    - Alberic

results.name: Yol
results.description: Summon forth your yol, proof of your recognition by the Azim Steppe Xaela as a true warrior.
results.enhanced_description: High atop the granite peaks of Othard's Fanged Crescent do the yol claim their demesne, descending to the Azim Steppe to prey upon the soft warriors who pretend not to fear the winged monsters of their ancestor's tales. Rare indeed is it that a yol might cede its back to the likes of man, though to those who have proved their mettle, the creatures have been known to make exception.
results.tooltip: I must have faith in myself and my yol...    - Zealous Mol Warrior

sources.text: In The Footsteps Of Bardam The Brave

results.name: Battle Panther
results.description: Summon forth your battle panther, fully armored to protect the stealthy beast from the occasional poison dart, poison arrow, poison-tipped spear, poison spell, and any poison words directed its way.
results.enhanced_description: History tells us that no dark hero's story is complete without the companionship of a wily panther. Their sable coat, their savage nature, their attunement with the umbral, their thirst for blood. It is as if the gods created these creatures in the image of a dark knight...or perhaps it was the other way around.
results.tooltip: If you help me out, I will tell you more about my feline friend here.    - Hinoshin

results.name: Battle Bear
results.description: Summon forth your battle bear, fully armored to protect the savage beast from singeing its lustrous fur on the smoldering carnage left in its wake.
results.enhanced_description: The bears of Abalathia's Spine are not known to suffer the presence of man in their territory, let alone allow one to mount their backs and command them hither and yon. Then what, pray tell, has come over this particular specimen? Perhaps one look into your inner beast convinced the creature that submission spelled survival.
results.tooltip: We're after a bear this time!? Oh boy, this should be fun!    - Enion

results.name: Battle Lion
results.description: Summon forth your battle lion, fully armored to protect the majestic beast from the dangers of close combat.
results.enhanced_description: There was a time when members of Ul'dah's elite Sultansworn strode the Steps of Nald and Thal atop silver-plated lions, striking fear and awe into the mewling masses. An effort to return to those days of glory has seen the summoning of several of Thavnair's most prominent beast tamers to the Rose of the Desert.
results.tooltip: Bright as a lamp, brave as a lion.    - Haermaga

results.name: Magitek Predator
results.description: Call into battle your magitek predator, and have you some fun.
results.enhanced_description: Predator series warmachina were originally designed in an attempt to improve magitek reaper killing potential via the addition of close-quarter weaponry. While the extra firepower led to a higher kill ratio, the weight it added severely hampered maneuverability. This unique model, however, appears to have had its weapons removed and replaced with an experimental propulsion engine.
results.tooltip: I ain't got time to bleed.    - Ancient Adage

results.name: Reveling Kamuy
results.description: Summon forth your reveling kamuy, blessed wolf who shall not be bound by such corporeal laws as gravity or aerodynamics.
results.enhanced_description: Upon receiving from his Kojin worshipers the offering of a sad, orphaned wolf pup, Susano proceeded to grant him the gift of flight, as well as an impressive coat of glowing fur, that he might be worthy of the revel.
results.tooltip: I ain't got words to mince with whelps...unless that is, you're here to become a wolf.    - Curious Gorge

results.name: Blissful Kamuy
results.description: Summon forth your blissful kamuy, blessed wolf who shall not be bound by such corporeal laws as gravity or aerodynamics.
results.enhanced_description: Believe it or not, this monstrous canine did not always glow, only achieving its heavenly effulgence upon receiving the blessing of Lakshmi after being offered to the Lady of Bliss by her loyal Ananta dreamers.
results.tooltip: This is no lone coywolf you'll be facing.    - Hetzkin

results.name: Lone Faehound
results.description: Summon forth your lone faehound, void-spawned aberration loyal to none save you and yours.
results.enhanced_description: Covered from muzzle to tail in an otherworldly silver coat, the faehound appears more akin to something out of a faerie tale than from the nether-reaches of the void. Yet do not be fooled by the beast's appearance, for he is an equal in strength to all but the highest ranking voidsent, his heart swollen with savagery from a lifetime hunting alone.
results.tooltip: Dogs is loyal.    - Latata

results.name: Pack Faehound
results.description: Summon forth your pack faehound, void-spawned aberration loyal to none save you and yours.
results.enhanced_description: Covered from muzzle to tail in an otherworldly silver coat, the faehound appears more akin to something out of a faerie tale than from the nether-reaches of the void. Yet do not be fooled by the beast's appearance, for she is an equal in strength to all but the highest ranking voidsent, her heart swollen with savagery from a lifetime leading a pack of her own.
results.tooltip: Are you inclined to think them faerie tales?    - Alberic

results.name: Pack Hellhound
results.description: Summon forth your pack hellhound, void-spawned aberration loyal to none save you and yours.
results.enhanced_description: Having commanded armies in the hellish darkness that is the void, this demonic beast will not soon submit at the feet of another. Which is why it is all the more surprising that the hound would allow someone on her back.
results.tooltip: A good hound keeps her maw shut.    - Latata

results.name: Lone Hellhound
results.description: Summon forth your lone hellhound, void-spawned aberration loyal to none save you and yours.
results.enhanced_description: Having survived, alone, the hellish darkness that is the void, this demonic beast will not soon suffer the presence of others, choosing typically to attack before he himself becomes a victim. Which is why it is all the more surprising that the hound would allow someone on his back.
results.tooltip: What in the seven unholy hells are those gruesome things!?    - Laraina

results.name: Archon Throne
results.description: Summon forth your Archon throne. Don't call it a high chair.
results.enhanced_description: Despite claims that it was once the chair of Louisoix Leveilleur, former residents of Sharlayan have confirmed that it is naught more than an ordinary furnishing enchanted by a Great Gubal Library bibliophile who was tired of not being able to reach the upper shelves.
results.tooltip: There's a chair over there just cryin' out to be sat on.    - Baderon

results.name: Eggshilaration System
results.description: Call into battle your eggshilaration system. Egg puns required for propulsion.
results.enhanced_description: After learning of the latest of the Dreamer's visions─a giant floating ovoid delivering eggs to all the good boys and girls of the realm─Nonotta and friends literally scrambled to find a means of bringing her dream to life. All it required was a little aid from the Sons of Saint Coinach...and the remnants of some ancient Allagan technology.
results.tooltip: Why do the Qiqirn suck eggs?    - Ba Go

results.name: Raigo
results.description: Summon forth Raigo. Whether or not he heeds the call depends entirely on the number of bloodied laurels in your crown.
results.enhanced_description: The most daunting of Mado horses, Raigo eclipses its unholy brethren Goten and Ginga in both size and ferocity. As such, the creature will not suffer the burden of carrying a soul unbloodied, and therefore unworthy.
results.tooltip: Your inner horse, my dear adventurer, must be a steed of rare beauty.    - Golden Uma Yoriki

results.name: Firebird
results.description: Summon forth your Firebird. Not Phoenix. Definitely not Phoenix.
results.enhanced_description: The Far East is home to numerous legends concerning birds of flame who sacrifice their lives to save the world, only to rise from the ashes of destruction to rule the skies once again. The Firebird is one of those legends...made a mount.
results.tooltip: I was hoping for a fine bird.    - Grimold

results.name: Demonic Lanner
results.description: Summon forth your Demonic lanner─a symbol of justice for the Zurvan-worshipping races which once thrived on the southern continent of Meracydia.
results.enhanced_description: The centaurs of ancient Meracydia believed that their mighty god Zurvan would send out his lanner before a battle to inform his enemies of their impending defeat.
results.tooltip: Watched me like a bloody hawk, he did.    - Austere Adventurer

results.name: Ginga
results.description: Summon forth Ginga. A man-made aberration from a land that exists only in whispers. Its name is said to mean “silver fang.”
results.enhanced_description: This otherworldly mount, cobbled together from the carcasses of noble beasts and armored in elaborate silver plate, is said only to accept as riders those who have proven their might and mettle on the fields of battle.
results.tooltip: Be as the horse, and leave behind all doubts and bafflement!    - Black Uma Doshin

results.name: Goten
results.description: Summon forth Goten. A man-made aberration from a land that exists only in whispers. Its name is said to mean “roaring heavens.”
results.enhanced_description: This otherworldly mount, cobbled together from the carcasses of noble beasts and armored in elaborate gold plate, is said only to accept as riders those who have proven their might and mettle on the fields of battle.
results.tooltip: The horse is merciful and generous in victory.    - Golden Uma Doshin

results.name: Flying Cumulus
results.description: Summon forth the flying cumulus. It is unclear whether its previous owner was a boy with a tail or simply a monkey.
results.enhanced_description: There is but one man in all of Hydaelyn who can create such a mystical masterpiece, and it is said he resides upon a misty peak hidden within the mountain ranges of Doma. Crafted by stitching together dozens of smaller clouds, the cumulus allows a single rider to explore the skies...but only if she has an inherent affinity for magicks.
results.tooltip: Mental note: pick no quarrel with Domans.     - Thancred

results.name: Arrhidaeus
